title: TV graphics: a training programme (TEFC)
creator_credit: Centre for Educational Television Overseas and Muhip Babalik
brief_description: Outlines the main steps in the production of word captions, photo captions, simple animation for captions and other graphics for television. Good results are achieved not just by good layout and effective text but also by proper production techniques which ensure a good picture on the screen. Commentator: Tom Singleton.
